scripts.assets:edgeDrawers: mkdir -p src/edge lib/edge && cp node_modules/kaavio/src/drawers/edges/index.ts src/edge/edgeDrawers.ts && cp node_modules/kaavio/lib/drawers/edges/index.js lib/edge/edgeDrawers.js
scripts.build: npm run assets && npm run compile
scripts.compile: mkdir -p lib && npm run assets && npm run compile:xsd && npm run compile:es5
scripts.compile:es5: tsc --project tsconfig.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected: echo 'Setting expected values for tests' && npm-run-all expected:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected:checksums: echo 'Setting expected checksums' && npm-run-all expected:checksums:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected:checksums:chunked: curl --limit-rate 10K "http://webservice.wikipathways.org/getPathwayAs?fileType=xml&pwId=WP554&revision=77712&format=xml" | xpath "*/ns1:data/text()" | base64 --decode | bin/gpml2pvjson --id http://identifiers.org/wikipathways/WP554 | shasum -p -a 1 > "test/input/chunked.json.sha1sum"
scripts.expected:checksums:local: for f in ./test/input/*.gpml{,.xml}; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.xml$// | sed s/.gpml$//`; WPID=`echo "$f" | sed "s/.*_WP/WP/" | sed "s/.xml$//" | sed "s/_.*.gpml$//"`; echo "Converting $f to JSON and generating checksum..."; cat "$f" | bin/gpml2pvjson --id "http://identifiers.org/wikipathways/$WPID" | shasum -p -a 1 > "$base_path.json.sha1sum"; done
scripts.expected:checksums:gpml-test-cases: for f in node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test-cases/**/*.gpml{,.xml}; do echo "Converting $f to JSON and generating checksum..."; filename=`echo "$f" | sed "s/.*GPML2013a\///" | sed s/.xml$// | sed s/.gpml$//`; cat "$f" | bin/gpml2pvjson | shasum -p -a 1 > "test/input/$filename.test-cases.json.sha1sum"; done
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm-run-all test:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test:checksums:chunked: echo 'Testing converter against WP554 rev. 77712 from WP webservice (chunked response / intentionally slow).' && curl --limit-rate 10K "http://webservice.wikipathways.org/getPathwayAs?fileType=xml&pwId=WP554&revision=77712&format=xml" | xpath "*/ns1:data/text()" | base64 --decode | bin/gpml2pvjson --id http://identifiers.org/wikipathways/WP554 | shasum -p -a 1 -c "test/input/chunked.json.sha1sum"
scripts.test:checksums:local: for f in ./test/input/*.gpml{,.xml}; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.xml$// | sed s/.gpml$//`; WPID=`echo "$f" | sed "s/.*_WP/WP/" | sed "s/.xml$//" | sed "s/_.*.gpml$//"`; echo "Testing converter against $f..."; cat "$f" | bin/gpml2pvjson --id "http://identifiers.org/wikipathways/$WPID" | shasum -p -a 1 -c "$base_path.json.sha1sum"; done
scripts.test:checksums:gpml-test-cases: for f in node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test-cases/**/*.gpml{,.xml}; do echo "Testing converter against $f"; filename=`echo "$f" | sed "s/.*GPML2013a\///" | sed s/.xml$// | sed s/.gpml$//`; cat "$f" | bin/gpml2pvjson | shasum -p -a 1 -c "test/input/$filename.test-cases.json.sha1sum"; done
